caption.p: Adipose tissue differential gene expression analysis. Transcriptional changes were assessed between 8-week-old male Adipoq-Cre ± mice and Cre-negative littermate controls using mRNA sequencing. Differential expressed genes with a p-value less than 0.01 (grey line) are identified in red, above all other genes which are black. (a) Brown adipose tissue, (b) inguinal white adipose tissue, (c) perigonadal white adipose tissue. Representative genes are shown. n = 4/group
